attributes.action: not agree to add flouride to tap water
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We are still unaware of the potential dangers of adding flouride to drinking water.  It is proven that more than 2 mg/L can cause painful bone disorders and bone cancer in boys.
I wish to exercise my civil rights to choose.
The government should be resolving the issues with NHS dentists and not nannying.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
